boardgame.name: Krosmaster Arena
Krosmaster: Arena
boardgame.description: In Hormonde, a strange world deep in the folds of time, the Hour Demons have finally found a hobby worthy of their cruel hearts... the Arena! The idea is simple. They select warriors of all ages and lands and whisk them away to the Hormonde where the enslaved gladiators must fight for their souls and the chance to become the ultimate champion. Why don't the gods put an end to this macabre circus? Why does Xelor himself turn a blind eye to the demons' meddling with time's delicate web? Well, you may ask, but it is not for us mortals to know the minds of the gods._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Krosmaster: Arena is a player-vs-player, tactical card game with anime-style miniatures that offers the craftiest tacticians among you the chance to challenge other players to heated battles in arenas scattered around Hormonde. All players build their team using a pre-determined method, whether a point system, draft, or at random. Equip your team with spells, weapons and other items adapted to their requirements, then utilize their various talents and abilities to create a powerful fighting force. Every figure has a point value attached to it to help balance things out. Randomly drawn event cards spice up the game at each turn, and the winning conditions differ for each game based on the scenario you choose to play. Only those who are able to create a strong, yet versatile, strategy will prevail!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Japanime Games (JPG201) Krosmaster: Arena. Welcome to the Krozmos. The Demons of the Hours and Minutes have finally found a hobby worthy of their cruel hearts... the Arena! The idea is simple. They select warriors from across many lands and ages and whisk them away to the Arena, where the enslaved gladiators must fight for their souls and the chance to become the ultimate champion. Working with Ankama, we are excited to bring the worlds of Dofus and Wakfu to your tabletop. Krosmaster: Arena is a Player vs Player-oriented board game that offers the craftiest tacticians among you the chance to challenge other players in heated battle. All players build their team using a pre-determined method, either a point system, draft, or at random. Utilize your team_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s various talents and abilities to create a powerful fighting force. Every figure has a point value attached to it to help balance things out.

KS Tricked-out version (see KS page for details) * Base Game (NIS) * Alternate Trees and bushes (unpunched sheets) * Special Resin Terrain set (8 trees, 8 shrubs, 4 crates) * Special Token pack (2 water bombs, 1 rabbit, 1 lost puppet, 2 sacrificed puppet, 1 blocking puppet, 2 tornado bomb, 2 incendiary bomb, 1 dead trap, 3 tofu, 1 bouftou) * 15 Metallic Gallons of Glory tokens * 60 Kama metallized coins * 2 sets of engraved dice * Special KS dice tower **OVER $200-worth of game and add-ons** **Japananime is saying that the resin terrain and tokens will only be available at conventions** [I pledged big, but can no longer afford to keep - priced to move]

Total 330 euro. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Kickstarter item 1: 120 euro Brand new resine scenary for the game Krosmaster arena. This includes, in meticulously pre-painted resin: 8 Trees 8 Bushes 4 Crates _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Kickstarter item 2: 200 euro Krosmaster Game Resin Token pack 2 Waterbomb Tokens 1 Wabbit Token 1 Lost Puppet Token 1 Crazy Puppet Token 2 Sacrificed Puppet Token 1 Blocking Puppet Token 2 Tornadobomb Tokens 2 Incendiary Bomb Tokens 1 Dead Trap Token 3 Tofu Tokens 1 Bouftou Token Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC Any questions just ask.

Brand new, never opened, never played. Gotta clear some games out to make room for new ones, so my loss is your gain. Shipping is $8.00. If you purchase more than one game I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to consolidate packages to save shipping . Paypal only please. And sorry, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t sell to buyers outside of the US.

Kickstarter bundle, includes the base game, metal Kamas, metal Gallons, PVC tokens, resin scenery, alternative scenery, KS dice, XL cards, complete set of promo figures and all 8 expansion packs. (Basically everything from the $595 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;I want it all now_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; level apart from the XXL figure, duplicate promos and dice tower) Played the introductory scenarios only, so the majority of it has just sat in a display unit!

Japanime Games (JPG201) Krosmaster: Arena. Welcome to the Krozmos. The Demons of the Hours and Minutes have finally found a hobby worthy of their cruel hearts... the Arena! The idea is simple. They select warriors from across many lands and ages and whisk them away to the Arena, where the enslaved gladiators must fight for their souls and the chance to become the ultimate champion. Working with Ankama, we are excited to bring the worlds of Dofus and Wakfu to your tabletop. Krosmaster: Arena is a Player vs Player-oriented board game that offers the craftiest tacticians among you the chance to challenge other players in heated battle. All players build their team using a pre-determined method, either a point system, draft, or at random. Utilize your team_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s various talents and abilities to create a powerful fighting force. Every figure has a point value attached to it to help balance things out.

Did you miss out on Miniature Market_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Krosmaster clearance a few months back? Well, here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s you chance to get that exact same deal. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m passing it on to you for the price I paid… I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll even give you FREE SHIPPING! (Continental US only; everyone else will get a $10 credit towards actual shipping. PM me before purchasing if this would apply to you.) You won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find these prices anywhere else… in fact, this lot would be $20 more from an online discounter. Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what it includes: Krosmaster: Arena Base Game. Opened but unpunched and unplayed. Cards are still in shrink. Set 1: Fire _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Ice. Unopened Set 2: Percimol Rules. Unopened Set 3: Remington Style. Opened but unpunched/unused. PROMO: Amelia. Unopened. Check out the other items in my Marketplace! I combine shipping! I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll entertain reasonable offers for purchasing multiple items.
For Auction winner Chad Shamrowicz (Shamurai). If that is not you please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t buy this.

Includes base game + all official expansions + custom BF case that was designed in the forums ($90 and over 2 months to receive). I have realized this game is too fragile to have around with a 4 year old and 11 month old and as much as I would enjoy playing this with them as they get older, I am not going to risk the investment. I spent over $350 buying this brand new. Has not been played, opened and then placed into the battlefoam to protect it. Message me with questions, concerns. Thank you. For an additional price, I do have the 8 original promo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that can be included in the package.
Box has been opened, but the contents are unpunched and unused. Perfect shape!!

Selling my base game, everything comes in bags, the cards are sleeved and it has only been played once. Unfortunately one of the characters arms fell off, and one is missing. The arm can be reattached, but needs to be glued. Images can be found at the Imgur link, or in this listing. http://imgur.com/a/lJ2rV

French Base game with German Cards for all Season 1 Characters and a lot of expansion characters. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a mix of french, german and english expansion packs though. About 4 figures are slightly damaged (of course they still work, but it is noteworthy). In total the value for buying everything new was 250 Euros. Since it is an odd compilation and there are the damaged figures I am going with this very low price for it. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s only collecting dust at my place ;) Everything is in the base box. Bank transfer to German bank account also possibly. You can also drop by in Berlin if you want to save the shipping cost, otherwise the buyer will also have to pay for the shipping. Cheers Marc

We also won free Amalia _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Captain Amakna figures (Included w/ character cards). Captain Amakna_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s legs came off his body. Nothing a bit of glue won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fix. He_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a freebie, what can you say? A Merkator figure is included as well... but I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know where his character card went and we have two Captain Amakna cards. Weird. Shipping is $15.00 to anywhere in the US.
